products.title: Splash Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash black roller blind in black. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Opt for splash black to create a chic statement look in your home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2327 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
